Uses of Class
nitf.BandSource

Uses of BandSource in nitf
 

Subclasses of BandSource in nitf
 class FileSource
          FileSource The FileSource class extends the BandSource class, allowing you to provide data from an IOHandle.
 class MemorySource
          MemorySource The MemorySource class extends the BandSource class, allowing you to provide data from a memory buffer.
 

Methods in nitf that return BandSource
 BandSource ImageSource.getBand(int number)
          Returns the BandSource associated by the position denoted by number
 BandSource[] ImageSource.getBandSources()
          Returns an array of the BandSources associated with this ImageSource
protected static BandSource BandSource.getByAddress(long address)
          This returns the BandSource object represented by the given underlying memory address.
 

Methods in nitf with parameters of type BandSource
 boolean ImageSource.addBand(BandSource bandSource)
          Adds another BandSource to this ImageSource
protected static void BandSource.register(BandSource bandSource)
          This sets the class type for the given BandSource instance
